properties.areaDesc: Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 21 at 4:07AM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 knots and waves 3 to 6 feet.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Hamlin Beach
to Mexico Bay.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY
